summary_teim: Frank Barsalona, Seymour Stein, the O'Jays, and Percy Sledge are inducted in the 2005 ceremony. Includes performances by the O'Jays and Percy Sledge.
summary_ssm: Frank Barsalona, Seymour Stein, the O'Jays, and Percy Sledge are inducted in the 2005 ceremony. Includes performances by the O'Jays and Percy Sledge.
contents_teim: Ahmet Ertegun and Jann Wenner introduce Little Steven -- Little Steven inducts Frank Barsalona -- Frank Barsalona accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Ice-T -- Ice-T inducts Seymour Stein -- Seymour Stein accepts his award -- Backstabbers, For the Love of Money, Love Train (O'Jays) -- Justin Timberlake inducts the O'Jays -- the O'Jays accept their award -- Rod Stewart inducts Percy Sledge -- Percy Sledge accepts his award -- When a Man Loves a Woman (Percy Sledge)

abstract_ssm: Induction ceremony 2005 -- Ahmet Ertegun and Jann Wenner introduce Steve Van Zandt -- Steven Van Zandt (with James Gandolfini, and Steve Schirripa) induct Frank Barsalona -- Frank Barsalona accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Ice-T -- Ice-T inducts Seymour Stein -- Seymour Stein accepts his award -- Backstabbers; For the Love of Money; Love Train (O'Jays) -- Justin Timberlake inducts the O'Jays -- the O'Jays accept their award -- Rod Stewart inducts Percy Sledge -- Percy Sledge accepts his award -- When a Man Loves a Woman (Percy Sledge)
